name: 5 Minutes to Kill
summary: 5 Minutes to Kill is a speed mapping project where every consecutive map in the set gets 5 more minutes of mapping time. Starting at 5 minutes with MAP1, 10 minutes with MAP02, 15 minutes with MAP03, etc. The levels are organized by mapping time, NOT by difficulty, and the mapset is also a bit of a variety pack, with gameplay ranging from classic techbases, to combat challenges, to slaughter.
